price: 54 Ils reposeront sur des tapis aux revers de brocart, les fruits du Paradis à leur portée.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
